data.actual_result: A bottom portion of the panels doesn't colour in
data.expected_result: Panels should be fully coloured in
data.short_description: Overlay Notification panels don't colour in fully
data.steps_to_repro: - Be using Light Theme (Dark Theme works as well, but it's really hard to notice) - Go into your User Settings -> Overlay - Scroll down to the Overlay Notification display and set it to one of the side panels, then observe the bottom of the panel
